name: Faro (MarineLife)
description:
the story

Even in a dark and strange environment you can find friendships. Go on a legendary journey towards what the heart desires.

Talk to creatures and learn about them and the world around you to find your way. Sometimes you will succeed and sometimes you will fail, this is part of life. The success of the missions will determine if you manage to discover the secret of the lighthouse.

Controls:

Arrow Keys & AD  - Movement

Space - Jump

E - Dialogue

Shift - Special Ability

playtesting 

The game is currently in the prototyping phase and we are doing a playtesting to learn what can be improved.

We would be happy if you could play and answer this short questionnaire (2-3 minutes): https://forms.gle/Eo8JEvn2CHwvX9yj8
